headline: Arch Capital Group (NasdaqGS:ACGL) Integrates Wilqo Into Charlie Platform For Enhanced Rate Quotes
summary: Arch Capital Group (NasdaqGS:ACGL) recently announced the integration of Arch Mortgage Insurance's rate quote capabilities with Wilqo into their Charlie platform, potentially enhancing the mortgage lending process. This development was part of the factors contributing to the company's stock price increase of 3% over the last quarter. The period also saw the declaration of preferred dividends and a share buyback update, while their Q1 earnings reported a drop in net income despite a rise in...
